comment: Not going to change your world, but pleasant, spicier than their port cask and nice dark fruits. Also incredibly inexpensive so...
Страхотен аромат на горски плодове и карамел, но много разочароващо тяло.
Very cool bouquet on the nose. Literally can feel the cabernet. Body is disappointing.

Speyside whiskey, not smoky
A little bit sharp on the 40s that goes away quickly and quite smooth on the aftertaste slips down very easily!
Some apple our pear notes heavy alcohol taste
Definitely a lot of clean speyside malt with fruity notes from the cask, but as opposed to the buttery chard, the cab ends up more chocolatey

Nose: raisins, gasoline
Taste: earthy, raisins
Nose vanilla, grape, pear. Pallet pear,  raisins
Not amazing. But not bad for the price. Spicy in the beginning but a semi smooth finish.
